00010 namespace glm
00011 {
00012         // fastPow:
00013         template <typename genType>
00014         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER genType fastPow(genType const & x, genType const & y)
00015         {
00016                 return exp(y * log(x));
00017         }
00018 
00019         VECTORIZE_VEC_VEC(fastPow)
00020 
00021         template <typename T>
00022         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER T fastPow(const T x, int y)
00023         {
00024                 T f = static_cast<T>(1);
00025                 for(int i = 0; i < y; ++i)
00026                         f *= x;
00027                 return f;
00028         }
00029 
00030         template <typename T, precision P>
00031         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec2<T, P> fastPow(
00032                 const detail::tvec2<T, P>& x, 
00033                 const detail::tvec2<int, P>& y)
00034         {
00035                 return detail::tvec2<T, P>(
00036                         fastPow(x.x, y.x),
00037                         fastPow(x.y, y.y));
00038         }
00039 
00040         template <typename T, precision P>
00041         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec3<T, P> fastPow(
00042                 const detail::tvec3<T, P>& x, 
00043                 const detail::tvec3<int, P>& y)
00044         {
00045                 return detail::tvec3<T, P>(
00046                         fastPow(x.x, y.x),
00047                         fastPow(x.y, y.y),
00048                         fastPow(x.z, y.z));
00049         }
00050 
00051         template <typename T, precision P>
00052         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec4<T, P> fastPow(
00053                 const detail::tvec4<T, P>& x, 
00054                 const detail::tvec4<int, P>& y)
00055         {
00056                 return detail::tvec4<T, P>(
00057                         fastPow(x.x, y.x),
00058                         fastPow(x.y, y.y),
00059                         fastPow(x.z, y.z),
00060                         fastPow(x.w, y.w));
00061         }
00062 
00063         // fastExp
00064         // Note: This function provides accurate results only for value between -1 and 1, else avoid it.
00065         template <typename T>
00066         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER T fastExp(const T x)
00067         {
00068                 // This has a better looking and same performance in release mode than the following code. However, in debug mode it's slower.
00069                 // return 1.0f + x * (1.0f + x * 0.5f * (1.0f + x * 0.3333333333f * (1.0f + x * 0.25 * (1.0f + x * 0.2f))));
00070                 T x2 = x * x;
00071                 T x3 = x2 * x;
00072                 T x4 = x3 * x;
00073                 T x5 = x4 * x;
00074                 return T(1) + x + (x2 * T(0.5)) + (x3 * T(0.1666666667)) + (x4 * T(0.041666667)) + (x5 * T(0.008333333333));
00075         }
00076         /*  // Try to handle all values of float... but often shower than std::exp, glm::floor and the loop kill the performance
00077         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER float fastExp(float x)
00078         {
00079                 const float e = 2.718281828f;
00080                 const float IntegerPart = floor(x);
00081                 const float FloatPart = x - IntegerPart;
00082                 float z = 1.f;
00083 
00084                 for(int i = 0; i < int(IntegerPart); ++i)
00085                         z *= e;
00086 
00087                 const float x2 = FloatPart * FloatPart;
00088                 const float x3 = x2 * FloatPart;
00089                 const float x4 = x3 * FloatPart;
00090                 const float x5 = x4 * FloatPart;
00091                 return z * (1.0f + FloatPart + (x2 * 0.5f) + (x3 * 0.1666666667f) + (x4 * 0.041666667f) + (x5 * 0.008333333333f));
00092         }
00093 
00094         // Increase accuracy on number bigger that 1 and smaller than -1 but it's not enough for high and negative numbers
00095         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER float fastExp(float x)
00096         {
00097                 // This has a better looking and same performance in release mode than the following code. However, in debug mode it's slower.
00098                 // return 1.0f + x * (1.0f + x * 0.5f * (1.0f + x * 0.3333333333f * (1.0f + x * 0.25 * (1.0f + x * 0.2f))));
00099                 float x2 = x * x;
00100                 float x3 = x2 * x;
00101                 float x4 = x3 * x;
00102                 float x5 = x4 * x;
00103                 float x6 = x5 * x;
00104                 float x7 = x6 * x;
00105                 float x8 = x7 * x;
00106                 return 1.0f + x + (x2 * 0.5f) + (x3 * 0.1666666667f) + (x4 * 0.041666667f) + (x5 * 0.008333333333f)+ (x6 * 0.00138888888888f) + (x7 * 0.000198412698f) + (x8 * 0.0000248015873f);;
00107         }
00108         */
00109 
00110         VECTORIZE_VEC(fastExp)

00112         // fastLog
00113         template <typename genType>
00114         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER genType fastLog(genType const & x)
00115         {
00116                 return std::log(x);
00117         }
00118 
00119         /* Slower than the VC7.1 function...
00120         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER float fastLog(float x)
00121         {
00122                 float y1 = (x - 1.0f) / (x + 1.0f);
00123                 float y2 = y1 * y1;
00124                 return 2.0f * y1 * (1.0f + y2 * (0.3333333333f + y2 * (0.2f + y2 * 0.1428571429f)));
00125         }
00126         */
00127 
00128         VECTORIZE_VEC(fastLog)
00129 
00130         //fastExp2, ln2 = 0.69314718055994530941723212145818f
00131         template <typename genType>
00132         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER genType fastExp2(genType const & x)
00133         {
00134                 return fastExp(0.69314718055994530941723212145818f * x);
00135         }
00136 
00137         VECTORIZE_VEC(fastExp2)
00138 
00139         // fastLog2, ln2 = 0.69314718055994530941723212145818f
00140         template <typename genType>
00141         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER genType fastLog2(genType const & x)
00142         {
00143                 return fastLog(x) / 0.69314718055994530941723212145818f;
00144         }
00145 
00146         VECTORIZE_VEC(fastLog2)
00147 
00148 }//namespace glm
